name: Space Slime Assault
description:
Available now in public alpha!

You've been sent on your first, and possibly last mission - Destroy all the slimes.

Influenced by the nostalgic retro arcade shooters of the 80's, you must destroy swarms of slimes in this hand-crafted game with an original soundtrack.

What's coming in the full release?

In the near future, there will be more slime species to discover, detailed dimensions to explore and slime bosses to battle! We're about 50% done with the game already.
